name: Animal Puzzle - Drag 'n' Drop
description:
Want to go on a jungle safari or visit a farm? How about diving deep into the sea? Whatever your choice... there are lots of animals to discover!

***** APP FEATURES *****

• 30 amazing animal puzzles for children ages 1 to 5!
• Simple drag 'n' drop functionality easy to learn and control!
• 3 fun themes to choose from. Jungle, Farm, & Sea!
• 3 different puzzle types with increased difficulty!
• Pop bubbles, bananas and apples when a puzzle is completed!
